title: Virtue and Honor
description: It’s a lot to be twenty-one and to deal with life-and-death situations all the time. That’s Angela Waters’s reality as an emergency room nurse and angel. Still, it never could have prepared her for a divine destiny that will challenge everything she thought she knew.Mason Kearney keeps getting thrown into her path—and it’s got to be more than just coincidence. He’s taken with the brunette beauty and she doesn’t even notice the bits of her heart he steals every time he’s around, or the messages she’s receiving from her angelic bosses warning her to stay away from him.It turns out that Mason is not the only one interested in the pretty girl with violet eyes. There’s also a demon who is hell-bent on taking her wings. It’s not enough to avoid him, she’s got to destroy him. The fate of the earthbound angels relies on it.Challenge reluctantly accepted.It would just be nice if her heart would stop getting in the way.
author: Randi Perrin
